item.title: MindsDB GraphQL API (Grafbase)
item.description: Query MindsDB API with Grafbase as a GraphQL endpoint
item.content:
A GraphQL API for MindsDB using Grafbase that allows you to interact with MindsDB databases, projects, models, and more through a GraphQL interface.
Tech Stack:
- Typescript - Grafbase - GraphQL

item.title: Utility-Studio
item.description: A single source for text, youtube and link extraction and summarization.
item.content:
A application to perform extraction of information from web, youtube, or document links, download video/audio from youtube links, and summarize the text content.
Tech Stack:
- Refine (React, NextJS) - Appwrite (Functions, Storage) - Typescript - Python (Cloud Functions) - Material UI

item.title: Google Generative AI PaLM2 Golang SDK(Client)
item.description: Unofficial go SDK for Google Generative AI LLM PaLM2 API.
item.content:
A Golang Client (Wrapper) for the PaLM2 API.
Tech Stack:
- Golang

item.title: Django-Mermaid
item.description: Generate ER Diagram for your Django project in Markdown with Mermaid
item.content:
Create ER Diagrams (Entity Relationship Diagrams) of your Django projects related to different models of associated applications in Mermaid.
Tech Stack: - Python - Django

item.title: DJ Notes
item.description: A simple note app with core django and postgres
item.content:
A note taking application with features like markdown, syntax highlighting and filtering.
Tech Stack: - Django

item.title: APTUI
item.description: A terminal interface for testing and working with APIs and web requests.
item.content:
A terminal client interface for testing and working with APIs and web requests.
Tech Stack:
- Python - Textual - Rich

item.title: Lingo
item.description: A simple link-tree clone in Golang
item.content:
A simple link-tree clone in Golang. Create links for your website, blog, or social media handles from a single place for others to view.
Tech Stack: - Golang - Tailwind-CSS

item.title: Podevcast
item.description: Developer podcast at a single place
item.content: Tech Stack: - Python - Python Pacakges - feedparser - Netlify - GitHub Actions

item.title: Crossposter
item.description: crosspost your articles to devto, codenewbie, medium and hashnode

item.title: BackChat
item.description: A simple chat app with django-channels and HTMX
item.content:
A simple chat/messaging app created for exploring HTMX and django-channels.
Tech Stack: - Django - Django-Channels - Daphne - HTMX

item.title: DevQuotes
item.description: Dev quotes is a platform for developers to write inspireing quotes.
item.content:
A simple quote/post sharing app created for exploring Django.
Tech Stack: - Django - Bootstrap

item.title: World Atlas
item.content:
A simple word game using some django in the backend and javascript for frontend.
Tech stack: 1. Django 2. Django-Rest-Framework 3. Javascript
Django rest framework as an api for most of the operations in the game like:
1. Validating a user input place from database 2. Listing out all places from a given letter 3. Get a random place from a given letter 4. CRUD endpoint for the places in the database.
API Link: https://djangonaut.pythonanywhere.com/world-atlas/api/
